title: 325btc
author: 325btc
content: There is so much talk about russia taking over and china and weak dollar and things like russia oil gas.But things you should know to understood.Is BLackrock headquaters will be moved to china ?or russia ? Off course not it will stay in new york.Is CMEGROUP derivates and trading center will be moved out of usa ? Off course not.Will the russia or china or maybe india taking over FED REPO to supply with overnight transactions markets??Off course not.Second point if the central bank makes rates higher oil and even gas prices fall.And if oil prices fall who needs the rubles ?? Also blackrock control a lot world resources trhough foreign investment. And blackrock ceo is american and headquaters are in usa.The rumours that russia might nuke the nyc ,off course its not true becouse nobody not even the putin or china not dare to attack bankers of the new york.Those things are most important to understood so if you hear something like dollar is fall or usa empire fall or russia will take over it can not be taken seriously.If anyone has the information that blackrock will be owned by china or russia and they move out the blackrock and vaneck headquaters from the usa then we know but until all the most important instutions stays in usa the power is with usa.So lets stop jokes and we know russian nuclear threat and taking over is not serious.Merit for sure becouse now we know how the things are and we dont belive bs from the news

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: I expect that the following will happen. From Bible Revelation chapter 18:Quote from: https://biblehub.com/niv/revelation/18.htm8Therefore in one day her plagues will overtake her:death, mourning and famine.She will be consumed by fire,for mighty is the Lord God who judges her.And there is a whole lot more. Go, look.
